idea-plugin.name: Ultimate REST Client
idea-plugin.description:
A powerful REST client fully integrated into IntelliJ IDEA, designed to be stronger than Postman.


Key Features:

  • Smart Scanning: Automatically scan Spring Boot Controllers to generate API requests.
  • Postman Compatible: Import your existing Postman collections seamlessly.
  • Code Integration: Navigate directly from request UI to Java code (Controller methods).
